imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Upgraded solar + panel emblem logo, transparent background (solar-sparkle-logo-mark-transparent.dim_512x512.png)
- Upgraded horizontal logo lockup with emblem + wordmark on one line, transparent background (solar-sparkle-logo-lockup-horizontal-transparent.dim_1200x300.png)
- Favicon derived from the upgraded emblem, transparent background (favicon-solar-sparkle.dim_64x64.png)

## Edit Images
- Refine/modernize existing transparent logo mark while preserving concept (solar-sparkle-logo-transparent.dim_200x200.png > solar-sparkle-logo-transparent-v2.dim_200x200.png)

existing_features.title: Create an upgraded Solar Sparkle logo based on the two user-uploaded references (image-12.png, ONLY LOGO.jpeg), keeping the same recognizable solar + panel concept but with cleaner geometry, sharper edges, consistent stroke widths, improved contrast, and transparent background.
Add the upgraded logo image assets to the frontend as static files under frontend/public/assets/generated and ensure no runtime/backend dependency is required to load them.

Update the site to use the upgraded logo consistently in both the header and footer, replacing the current header logo source (/assets/solar_sparkle-removebg-preview.png) and the current footer logo source (/assets/generated/solar-sparkle-logo-transparent.dim_200x200.png).
Add a favicon using the upgraded logo and wire it into the HTML head so browser tabs show the updated branding.

new_feature_requests.summary: Upgrade the project logo (user requested logo upgrade; details TBD)

projectName: Upgrade Solar Sparkle logo and apply across header/footer
